    About Me
    Ruben Gutierrez: Website Designer

    Hello! my name is Ruben Gutierrez and I am a website designer in the greater Los Angeles, California area. I've been working with computers since I was 10 and I enjoy helping others solve problems.

    Email: rubengutierrezwebdesign@gmail.com

    Phone: (562) 475 - 8959


    Behance Twitter Dribbble

    A Little About What I Can Do

    Below you'll find some of the skills I've developed working on websites and computer over my

    Website Development

    From the fundamentals to up. Theirs thousands of ways to build a website and deploy it and I'm very familiar with a lot of them. With that being said I'm very familiar with the fundamentals (HTML,CSS, & JavaScript) and I also work with diffrent tools like. Static Site Generators.

    Website Design

    A websites content is the most essential component but the way your website looks can make the diffrence. With a great deal of pride and patience I take website that people have been building ontop of for a while and make them more uniform and presentable.

    Images & Illustrations

    Images and illustrations are essential for anyone looking to get some attention online, with the proper input I can help bring your products, services, and ideas to life. Using design tools like Photoshop and Illustrator I help the people I work with to convey the exact message and feeling they want they're customer to get.

    Wilingsness & Dedication

    I can create vector art and modify existing ones using vector based software like Adobe Illustrator and Inkscape
